jcr:content.jcr:description: This template enables one to achieve Fill, Sign (Scribble) and Submit flow.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Request For Hardship Determination

panel1393766190488.jcr:title: Personal Information
panel1393766190488.longDescription: Please provide personal information about yourself, where you stay, and your social security number in this section
panel1393766190488.name: PersonalInformation

panel1393766227897.longDescription: Please provide personal information about yourself, where you stay, and your social security number in this section.
panel1393766227897.name: Address

guidepanel_936167221225552.jcr:title: Reason for Request
guidepanel_936167221225552.longDescription:
Enter your Reason/Circumstances for Hardship Request.

  1. You may check more than one reasons if applicable.
  2. If you check 'Others', please provide an explanation, as needed, in the text box below it.
  3. Please attach documentation supporting your request.

Note: You may attach the documentation now or later (before Submitting your application) through the Attach Documents icon.
guidepanel_936167221225552.name: ReasonforRequest

vertically-grouped-checkbox.jcr:title: Check all that apply and add explanation as needed below.
vertically-grouped-checkbox.name: ReasonforRequest_vertically-grouped-checkbox
vertically-grouped-checkbox.options: [0=Reduction of household income,1=Paid out of pocket medical expenses,2=Increase in number of dependents,3=Moved to a higher cost of living area,4=Other - explain below]

guidetextbox_0.jcr:title: Provide explanation, as needed, and attach documentation supporting your request.
guidetextbox_0.name: ReasonforRequest_textbox_0
guidetextbox_0.shortDescription: Please explain why are you requesting Hardship

guidetextdraw._value: I cerifty that the statements on this form are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. By signing this form, I agree that VA may attempt to verify this information by computer matching agreement with other federal agencies.
guidetextdraw.name: textdraw

guidetextdraw_0._value: Note: The law provides severe penalities including fine or imprisonment, or both, for willful submission of any false statement or evidence of material fact.
guidetextdraw_0.name: Certification_textdraw_0

applicationformheader.applicationDescription: The Application for Hardship Determination form is used to determine whether the veteran's projected income for the current year will be substantially below the VA means test threshold due to a loss of income or increase in allowable deductible expenses. Veterans determined to have a financial hardship will be exempt from payment of hospital and medical care copays and qualify for enrollment in Priority Group 5, unless otherwise eligible for enrollment in a higher priority, from the date of request through the last day of the same calendar year.

text_1.text:
Required *

Fields marked with (*) are required fields. You will not be able to Submit the application without at least completing these fields.

 

To Save the in-progress version of the form, you can click save button. You may go back and Edit the form information any time you like.

 

The reset button will remove all filled values from the form fields.

 

Please Note that Submit will just check that the most necessary (required) fields have been filled by you.

Progress bar

The progress bar is an indicator which tells you if the required information in that section has been completed or not.

text.text:
I am applying for hardship determination.

  1. I understand that there are economic features yet to be considered before I am eligible for this benefit, and that I will soon be notified of the action taken on this application.
  2. I also understand that only one request for a financial hardship determination is available to the applicant for each claimed incident of financial hardship.

Make sure you have the following handy before you start filling the form.

 
  • Complete Address/Address proof
  • Financial Records
  • Social Security Number
